pages.title: Overview
pages.text: Speed increases the frequency that an upgrade does its work action.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This can be Obtained from Villagers. Normal Enchanting, and Enchanting Focused Book (Speed).

pages.title: Focus Book (Speed)
pages.text: Effective Enchanting levels are 0-50 by Default, Some mods may modify this enchant level ceiling.

pages.title: Levels
pages.text: Speed Effects Different Upgrades Differently, but for most, Level 5 (V) is the max level that is effective. See individual Upgrades Pages to see what levels of Speed an upgrade can use. $(li)Min Level 1. $(li)Max Level 5.
